0.name: Mining Success Narratives
0.description: Various success messages for mining operations

0.title: Rich Vein Discovered
0.message: Your scanners light up as you breach a particularly rich mineral deposit. This is going to be a good haul.

1.title: Standard Operation
1.message: The mining lasers cut through the asteroid surface smoothly. Nothing fancy, but steady work pays off.

2.title: Unexpected Find
2.message: Wait... these readings can't be right. There's something else embedded in this rock...

3.title: Jackpot Strike
3.message: ALERT: High-value mineral concentration detected! Your cargo hold is going to love this.

1.name: Mining Failure Narratives
1.description: Various failure messages for mining operations

0.title: Equipment Malfunction
0.message: The mining laser sputters and dies. You'll need to reset the system before trying again.

1.title: Unstable Asteroid
1.message: Cracks spiderweb across the asteroid's surface. You pull back before the whole thing fragments.

2.title: Pirate Interruption
2.message: Your proximity alarms blare. Three hostile contacts incoming. Looks like someone doesn't want you mining here.

2.name: Scan Discovery Narratives
2.description: Revealing what you've discovered during scans

0.title: Type-I Iron Cluster
0.message: Scan complete. Standard iron-rich asteroid cluster. Common, but valuable.

1.title: Type-II Platinum Vein
1.message: Your sensors pick up precious metal signatures. A platinum deposit—rare and extremely valuable.

2.title: Type-III Volatile Ice
2.message: WARNING: Volatile compounds detected. This asteroid contains explosive ice formations. Proceed with extreme caution.

3.title: Type-IV Rare Earth
3.message: Interesting... rare earth elements in high concentration. These are used in advanced ship components.

4.title: Type-V Ancient Core
4.message: This is impossible. These mineral formations predate the Surge by centuries. What were they mining for?

0.title: Active Station Hails
0.message: The station's automated systems acknowledge your approach. Docking clearance granted.

1.title: Derelict Silence
1.message: No response to your hails. The station's lights are dark. Looks like it's been abandoned for some time.

2.title: Distress Signal
2.message: Emergency beacon active. Life support failing. Someone on that station needs help—fast.
2.systemMessage: Distress signal detected - rescue mission available

3.title: Hostile Lockdown
3.message: WARNING: Weapons lock detected! The station's defense turrets are tracking your ship.
